Sprints.reportPath: C:\Users\Todd.Dowty\ENERGY RESEARCH LAB LTD\DCB1 - Distributed Current Bus - Documents\Software\End Of Sprint Reports

SoftwareProjects.S1049: Sandbox project to assess VisualGDB (Visual Studio plug-in for STM32 Dev)
SoftwareProjects.S1050: Sandbox project to assess RP2040 as a viable general purpose microcontroller
SoftwareProjects.S1051: Main Brain Stem for distributed iBus PSU with Bridgeless PFC and HFAC Output (under 100KHz)
SoftwareProjects.S1052: Sandbox project to assess STM32G431RBT's PWM capabilities to aid micro selection
SoftwareProjects.S1053: C# Win Form. Easy way to set period, duty and deadtime (if supported) on target micro
SoftwareProjects.S1054: Sandbox project to assess dsPIC33CH512MP508's PWM capabilities to aid micro selection
SoftwareProjects.S1055: Sandbox project to assess STM32G070RBT's PWM capabilities to aid micro selection
SoftwareProjects.S1056: Sandbox project to assess 66AK2G1x's PWM capabilities to aid micro selection
SoftwareProjects.S1057: Sandbox project to assess STM32H750's PWM capabilities to aid micro selection
SoftwareProjects.S1058: STM32 Code Generator (G070 and G431). Clocks, GPIO, USART's, some timers, helpers. In C++
SoftwareProjects.S1059: dsPIC33 Code Generator. Clocks and GPIO (including HTML IO report). In C
SoftwareProjects.S1061: Console App. Run from CMD line. Convert BIN to C Array.
SoftwareProjects.S1062: Uses STM32 Bootloader to reprogram the STM32 with image contained in a C Arrary
SoftwareProjects.S1063: Sandbox project to assess STM32G0B1 and play about with it
SoftwareProjects.S1064: Full bridge HFAC PSU for embedded application with dual bridge and phase correction
SoftwareProjects.S1065: Sandbox project to play about and assess the T20 FPGA from Efinix
SoftwareProjects.S1066: Sandbox project to play about and assess the ICE40 FPGA and ICEcube IDE from Lattice
SoftwareProjects.S1067: Brain Stem BITE (with Temporal Lobe) for distributed iBus PSU with Bridgeless PFC and HFAC Output (under 100KHz) (REF S1051)
SoftwareProjects.S1068: Assumes role of Frontal and Occipital Lobes for whatever fits it. UI Board with wireless connectivity. Replaced by S1077
SoftwareProjects.S1069: BITE micro for S1064 embedded HFAC
